excerpt: Explore the whole functionality of TMC603 3-Phase gate driver with the TMC603-EVAL.Later firmware versions support encoder and hall based FOC (field oriented control) control of 3-Phase BLDC or PMSM motors.TMC603-EVAL comes with USB or RS232 interface for easy parameterization. It supports supply voltages from 12V to 48V and motors with incremental quadrature encoders (a/b/n) or hall sensors.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.
